heading: 1.1 Information in the Economy: The “factors”
text:
date \(t=1,2,\dots,T\), agents receive new information observing factors, also called states. denote (\(K\)-dimensional) vector factors \(w_t\). Vector \(w_t\) usually random. date \(t\), vector \(w_t\) supposed perfectly observed agents (investors), can partially observed, unobserved econometrician.Naturally, \(w_t\) can decomposed different sub-vectors different natures. instance, can \(w_t = (y_t', z_t')'\)

* \(z_t\): regime, unobserved econometrician.components \(w_t\) can prices. instance, one component short-term rate, stock return, exchange rate. can also include macroeconomic variables (inflation, GDP growth), agent-specific variables.
